articles.title: WhatsApp working on broadcast channel conversation along with 12 new features - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
San Francisco, May 13 (IANS): Meta-owned WhatsApp is reportedly working on a broadcast channel conversation on Android, including 12 new features.
The ability to view channels is under development and it will be available to beta testers in a future update o…
